deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Bats
deck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures with big ears. Having big ears doesn't mean they're good listeners.

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Rocket
deck.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Balloon
deck.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

deck.name: Inferno Dragon
deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Goblin Gang
deck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

deck.name: Knight
deck.description: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Inferno Tower
deck.description: Defensive building, roasts targets for damage that increases over time. Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Goblin Gang
deck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

deck.name: Rocket
deck.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Rocket
deck.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Mortar
deck.description: Defensive building with a long range. Shoots exploding boulders that deal area damage. Cannot shoot at targets that get very close!

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Tornado
deck.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Miner
deck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

deck.name: Ice Wizard
deck.description: This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.

deck.name: Royal Ghost
deck.description: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: Bats
deck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures with big ears. Having big ears doesn't mean they're good listeners.

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip but packs a huge punch.

deck.name: Mega Minion
deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.name: Battle Ram
deck.description: Two Barbarians holding a big log charge at the nearest building, dealing significant damage if they connect; then they go to town with their swords!

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Miner
deck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
